title: "We're unable to log you in because you may be offline"

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: Is there a fix for this besides going into the config and deleting the lock thing i've done it 10 times doesn't work.

replies.body: Hey i found a fix. You'll need to go to C:\Windows\System32\drivers\etc find hosts. and just delete that file for some reason riots ip got placed on the IP address to be blocked. If you remove that hosts file itll connect for you and should start working again.

> [{quoted}](name=Newbd,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=A3XOuVkE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-06-18T17:21:31.471+0000)
>
> Hey i found a fix. You'll need to go to C:\Windows\System32\drivers\etc find hosts. and just delete that file for some reason riots ip got placed on the IP address to be blocked. If you remove that hosts file itll connect for you and should start working again.

I love you

There was a small hiccup with the login servers overnight it seems, as a number players on NA were unable to get signed in. I'm glad that fix from the known issue thread was able to help, but definitely hit us back up if this starts happening again!
